mapper.sql: order_id, commodity_id, user_id, address_id, price, pay_type, create_time, order_status, order_type, del_flag, commodity_type
mapper.insert: insert into order_pay (order_id, commodity_id, user_id, address_id, price, pay_type, create_time, order_status, order_type, del_flag, commodity_type) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update order_pay
commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commodity_type = #{commodityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update order_pay set commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_type = #{commodityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT t_o.order_id AS orderId, t_u.nick_name AS nickName, DATE_FORMAT(t_o.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS orderTime, t_o.price/100 AS price, CASE t_o.order_status WHEN '0' THEN '未支付' WHEN '1' THEN '已支付' ELSE '' END AS orderStatus, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(t_o.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ,'') AS payTime FROM order_pay t_o LEFT JOIN user t_u ON t_o.user_id = t_u.user_id WHERE t_o.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY t_o.create_time DESC
